1 v 4 game of cat and mouse.  Survivors either hide from the killer or loop them around parts of the map to buy their team time.  Killers try to track down survivors and kill them all before they can repair 5 gens and escape the map.   Not perfectly balanced, but definitely improving over time and is in a reasonable state. Its a lot of fun and there is a ton of variety with the different killers and maps. 

If you want to play survivor, I'd highly recommend finding at least one or two people to play with as solo queue can be somewhat frustrating.  

If you want to play as killer (which is the better way to earn "money" in the game), I'd recommend getting the cannibal so you can unlock a perk of his called "BBQ and chili", which will let you farm up faster.  Game is definitely a massive grind to unlock all perks on all characters, but it stays fun and fresh if you switch up who you play as.  

Also, if you find that (when playing killer) your left click doesn't work 100% of the time, go under display --> scale and layout --> and change size of text, apps, and other items to 100%.  That will fix it.
It's a really great game! The only thing I kinda don't like is that some killers ar3e overpowered.

This game used to be good and fun with the 1st 3-4 killers, but now it's so broken with unbalance matchmaking. Pairing up against killers with op purple perks. Everything just sucks about this game now. From too many broken purple perks for both survivors and killers, matchmaking, server so laggy, broken hit box, etc. I can't recommend this game at all. Just so horrible.

I did recive and award from this old review which did remind me that i should change it. So let's do this one more time.

The good stuff:
-Game bring some interesting killer into the game every season.
-Is getting amazing reworks for both, killers and maps.
-The new animations that they are bringing are interesting, looks good and ye gotta love that head movement when a survivors is saying "Yes" fast.
-Playing with your friends as survivor is really funny and interesting. The maximum amount is 4, but you cna play custom games with them if you are a group of 5 and even be the killer or let one of then hunt you and your survivors teamates.
-Some of the killers are famous ones like Freddy Kruger, Michael Myers or Pyramid Head. In a way is interesting to be chase by oen of those.
-Playing as killer cna be challenging, so if you like challenge become a main killer.
There are many many mounths till you unlock the 100% of the free content in DBD.
-You can unlock all the "perks" of the game by playing and waiting for the right one to appear at the "Shrine of Secrets".
-It has sometimes interesting events.
-Most of the content is free and you cna unlock it by just playing and as i said previously this game has months of playing to unlock the 100% of free content.

The bad stuff:
-Community is extremetly toxic in many way.
-Unless you play custom games, all of the "normal ones" are "rankeds" in a way due the constant ranking system, which someone when you just wanna have fun can lead to tryhard or toxic survivors and killers that just wanna climb to the top of the ranking most of the times ruinning the fun of the other players.
-The game, since the beta, has many many bugs. Is true that with the time the number of these is getting smaller but yet you can find some crazy ones.
-The hit boxes are one of the 3 biggest problems of this game, next to the toxic community and the camping/rushing. With the last patch it did get worse.
-The developers allow the survivors to rush generator and the killer to camp and even face camp survivors on the hooks. With both ruinning the experience of the players.
-Most of the evens are "Meh"
There is a really storng unbalance with some killers, like Leatherface(bubba) been powerful as f**k, while other are weak reeeally weak, like charlotte (we don't count victor cuz he is the real killer when it sohuld be a mere tool for charlotte, but instead the player spends more time with victor instea dof using charlotte).
There is some content like survivors and killers that you'll not be able to play unless you pay real money, which is bad.

Would i recommend this game?
Yep Yep, the game did get better with the time, but get use to the unlabance of strong killers if you play as survivor, or get used to tryhards unfair rushers if you play as killers.
Good game to play with friend tho.

Pros: 
1) Can be free to play. No added bonus during games for people who spends money on in-game currency
2) There is a progression system to unlock better perks/ items to help you during gameplay.

Netural:
1) A rank system that could motivate people to play, but, doesn't not have any rewards for reaching a better rank.

Cons: 
1) Some characters can only be unlocked using money
2) Matchmaking is unbalanced a lot of the times. If you are a low rank killer, you will be matched with very experienced high rank opponents.  
3) Can be repetitive but you can switch between Killer and Survivor to stave off boredom

[h1]史上优化最差的游戏+史上最拉胯的服务器[/h1]
光是这两点就足够我给差评了，首先说下这游戏的优化，我进游戏的第一反应是：一个16年的游戏，最高画质居然会这么差，给我一股求生之路打了低配补丁一样的感觉。另外你说画质差也就算了，我并不是追求画质的玩家，但是好歹优化也要做好吧？开着最低画质，甚至牺牲了分辨率，帧数都还不到30帧，一张图也才多大，一栋房子再加个前后院，视角一移到建筑上，瞬间变ppt，我怀疑这游戏是不是没经过优化就直接出来发售了。当然了有一部分是我电脑配置差的原因，但是起码大部分游戏开低画质下的游戏体验都还是不错的。这游戏细节不怎么样，各种穿模，空中挂钩我都不想说了，只要玩过就肯定会发现这问题，真的不知道为什么会这么吃配置。另外，这游戏是我见过的第一个不能手动设置画质的游戏。
再说下服务器，还没进游戏，就一直显示各种网络异常，好不容易进到房间里，结果出来个与房主的连接关闭，要么就是游戏结束的时候来个连接失败提示，偶尔还会卡在结算界面退不出去，游戏中掉线到还是没遇到，加入游戏的时候频繁掉线是真的受不了，玩人匹配还挺快，万一要是玩屠夫，排了10分钟，好不容易进去了，结果来个连接失败，是个人都得脑淤血。
说了这么一大堆，再说说这游戏好的一面吧，就可玩性来讲还是很高的，一次玩个5，6把蛮上瘾的。其他的，emmmm没什么好说的了。

The game is quite entertaining and provides dlcs based on horrormovies. So you can play ghostface or the demogorgon from stranger things as examples. The chases are fun and it feels rewarding similar to dark souls if you mindgame another player. Some killer concepts are extremely fun. My favorites are doctor, demogorgon, legion, pyramid head and huntress.

Very important to know is that the game (except some maps) is survivor-sided. It´s easier to escape as survivor than killing everyone as killer. 

The only thing i don´t like about the game is the beginner experience. The game can be overwhelming for example due to meta perks. Some perks are so great that nearly everyone runs them. 
As Survivor you have all the content you need. I suggest to level up: 
Meg (Adrenalin, Sprint burst)-> Dwight (bond)-> Bill (Borrowed time) 
Please do not level Claudette first because of self care. It´s a time wasting perk.
Claudettes and decisive strike users are basically my personal enemies in the game xD 
As Killer, most meta perks are dlc content. You can still get them without buying the dlc but it´s luckbased in the store.  I suggest everyone who wants to play killer to get leather face and plague. They have the best overall killer perks (bbq, infectious fright, corrupt intervention).
There is also some toxicity against killers in the game. But it´s not that much on pc. 
PS4 DBD seems to be as toxic as old League of legends.
